name: Jhon Mcneil Magtibay
title: Full Stack Developer
about:
Hi! I'm Mcneil. 
 
I'm a backend developer specializing in Java and Node.js, with a strong focus on building efficient, scalable, and secure server-side applications. I enjoy tackling complex problems and designing systems that perform seamlessly behind the scenes. 

When I’m not coding, you’ll probably find me exploring vast virtual worlds — I’m a big fan of open-world games, where I can dive into new adventures and uncover hidden details, much like I do in code.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
education.institution: Batangas State University The National Engineering School - Mabini Campus
Anselmo A. Sandoval Memorial National High School

projects.title: ATM CLI Process
projects.description: A command-line interface for ATM transactions.

projects.title: Tourism Website
projects.description: Beautiful tourism website showcasing destinations and packages.

projects.title: Pathpickr
projects.description: A track recommending application for students that helps them find suitable study paths.
